content: say it with flowers wearing this cozy crochet cardigan designed in shades of a spring bouquet red heart all in one flower power makes stitching posy motifs a breeze a contrasting solid of red heart super saver makes the rich elongated collar cuffs and edging stand out in style practice single_crochet half_double_crochet and more combining warmth with a touch of floral charm it s a must-have addition to your wardrobe materials red heart® all in one™ flower power™ 8 8 oz/250 g 417 yds/381 m sizes xs/s/m l/xl/2xl contrast a marigold 2005 2 2 balls 15 16 squares contrast b flower field 2014 2 2 balls 13 19 squares contrast c bluebell 2006 2 2 balls 15 16 squares red heart® super saver® 7 oz/198 g 364 yds/333 m contrast d soft white 0316 2 2 balls gauge motif = approx 6 15 cm square with larger hook sizes to fit chest measurement xs/s/m 28-38 71-96 5 cm l/xl/2xl 40-50 112-137 cm
